    # uniapp笔记

    • JavaScript
    • TypeScript 
    module.exports = function (str) {
    return typeof str === 'string' && str.trim() === str
}

    export default function isString (str: string) : str is string {
    return typeof str === 'string' && str.trim() === str
}
